subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{| style="float:right;padding:0px;margin-right:-5px;"
| [[File:Nabe.jpg|thumb|none|119px|{{lang|ja|鍋}}: traditional ''nabe'' (both the pot and the food)]]
| [[File:Cainz_Donabe_Hakusen-nagashi_19cm_2.jpg|thumb|none|118px|{{l|ja|土鍋|tr=''donabe''}}: traditional earthenware ''nabe'']]
|-
| [[File:The_woks_of_various_sizes.JPG|thumb|none|118px|{{l|ja|中華鍋|tr=''chūka nabe''}}: "Chinese ''nabe''", a.k.a. [[wok]]]]
| [[File:IB_tajine_01.jpg|thumb|none|118px|{{l|ja|タジン}}{{lang|ja|鍋}} (''tajin nabe''): a Moroccan [[tajine]]]]
|-
| [[File:Feuertopf_Peking.jpg|thumb|none|119px|{{l|ja|火鍋|tr=''hinabe''}}: a [[fondue]] pot]]
| [[File:Stock_Pot.jpg|thumb|none|119px|{{l|ja|スープ}}{{lang|ja|鍋}} (''sūpu nabe''): a soup pot or stockpot]]
|}
{{ja-kanjitab|なべ|yomi=k}}
Originally a compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=なべ}} elements {{compound|ja|sort=なべ|肴|tr1=na|t1=small snack, hors d'oeuvre|瓮|tr2=he|t2=a pot or pan for holding food or beverages}}. {{rendaku2|sort=なべ|he|be}}

subSections.title: Noun
Related terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|釜|かま}}: a big [[pot]], a [[kettle]] or [[boiler]]
* {{ja-r|御釜|おかま}}: a [[maidservant]]; {{qualifier|slang}} one's [[butt]]; {{qualifier|slang}} a [[gay]] man
* {{ja-r|御鍋|おなべ}}: a [[maidservant]]; [[nightwork]]; {{qualifier|slang}} a [[lesbian]]
